original_title: The Gate: Dawn of the Bahá’í Faith
overview: In the midst of religious intolerance and extremism, one religion—the Bahá’í Faith—offers a path toward world peace by advocating the oneness of humanity’s major religions. Now, this groundbreaking documentary tells the amazing, little-known story of the origins of the Bahá’í Faith.
title: The Gate: Dawn of the Bahá’í Faith
